verses.verse: God <WG2316>, having of old time <WG4181> spoken <WG2980> unto the fathers <WG3962> in <WG1722> the prophets <WG4396> by <WG1722> divers portions and <WG2532> in divers manners <WG4187>,

hath <WG2980> at <WG1909> the end <WG2078> of these <WG3778> days <WG2250> spoken <WG2980> unto us <WG2254> in <WG1722> his Son <WG5207>, whom <WG3739> he appointed <WG5087> heir <WG2818> of all things <WG3956>, through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he made <WG4160> the worlds <WG165>;

who <WG3739> being <WG5607> the effulgence <WG541> of <WG1391> his glory <WG1391>, and <WG2532> the very image <WG5481> of <WG5287> his <WG846> substance <WG5287>, and <WG5037> upholding <WG5342> all things <WG3956> by the word <WG4487> of <WG1411> his <WG846> power <WG1411>, when he had4160, 1223, 1438 made purification <WG2512> of <WG2257> sins <WG266>, sat down <WG2523> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the Majesty <WG3172> on <WG1722> high <WG5308>;
having become <WG1096> by so much <WG5118> better <WG2909> than the angels <WG32>, as <WG3745> he hath inherited <WG2816> a more excellent <WG1313> name <WG3686> than <WG3844> they <WG846>.

For <WG1063> unto which <WG5101> of the angels <WG32> said <WG2036> he at any time <WG4218>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> my <WG3450> Son <WG5207>, This day <WG4594> have <WG1080> I <WG1473> begotten <WG1080> thee <WG4571>? and <WG2532> again <WG3825>, I <WG1473> will be <WG2071> to <WG1519> him <WG846> a Father <WG3962>, And <WG2532> he <WG846> shall be <WG2071> to <WG1519> me <WG3427> a Son <WG5207>?

And <WG1161> when <WG3752> he again <WG3825> bringeth <WG1521> in the firstborn <WG4416> into <WG1519> the world <WG3625> he saith <WG3004>, And <WG2532> let <WG4352> all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316> worship <WG4352> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> of4314, Ezekiel3 the angels <WG32> he saith <WG3004>, Who <WG3588> maketh <WG4160> his <WG846> angels <WG32> winds <WG4151>, And <WG2532> his <WG846> ministers <WG3011> a flame <WG5395> of fire <WG4442>:

but <WG1161> of <WG4314> the Son <WG5207> he saith <WG4675>, Thy throne <WG2362>, O God <WG2316>, is for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>; And the sceptre <WG4464> of uprightness <WG2118> is the sceptre <WG4464> of <WG932> thy <WG4675> kingdom <WG932>.

Thou hast loved <WG25> righteousness <WG1343>, and <WG2532> hated <WG3404> iniquity <WG458>; Therefore1223, 5124 God <WG2316>, thy <WG4675> God <WG2316>, hath anointed <WG5548> thee <WG4571> With the oil <WG1637> of gladness <WG20> above <WG3844> thy <WG4675> fellows <WG3353>.

And <WG2532>, Thou <WG4771>, Lord <WG2962>, in <WG2596> the beginning <WG746> didst lay the foundation <WG2311> of the earth <WG1093>, And <WG2532> the heavens <WG3772> are <WG1526> the works <WG2041> of <WG5495> thy <WG4675> hands <WG5495>:
They <WG846> shall perish <WG622>; but <WG1161> thou <WG4771> continuest <WG1265>: And <WG2532> they all <WG3956> shall wax old <WG3822> as doth <WG5613> a garment <WG2440>;

And <WG2532> as <WG5616> a mantle <WG4018> shalt thou roll <WG1667> them <WG846> up <WG1667>, As a garment <WG2532>, and they shall be changed <WG236>: But <WG1161> thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> the same <WG846>, And <WG2532> thy <WG4675> years <WG2094> shall <WG1587> not <WG3756> fail <WG1587>.

But <WG1161> of <WG4314> which <WG5101> of the angels <WG32> hath he said <WG2046> at any time <WG4218>, Sit <WG2521> thou on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, Till2193, Leviticus2 I make <WG5087> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> the footstool <WG5286> of thy <WG4675> feet <WG4228>?

Are they <WG1526> not <WG3780> all <WG3956> ministering <WG3010> spirits <WG4151>, sent forth <WG649> to <WG1519> do service <WG3010> for <WG1223> the sake of them that <WG3588> shall <WG3195> inherit <WG2816> salvation <WG4991>?
